title: Bug 297013Unclosed stream in AjAttribute
description: Bug 297013Unclosed stream in AjAttribute Created attachment 153879 [details]Patch to close the stream at the end of the method.The getAllBytes() method of org.aspectj.weaver.AjAttribute uses aDataOutputStream to write into a ByteArrayOutputStream. However, the stream isneither closed nor flushed at the end of the method, so that its not sure thatall bytes are actually written (it depends on the implemention ofDataOutputStream).To fix it, one should add a call to close() or flush(). A patch is attached.
